column2: Fix for IDEA-180133: allow hg4idea to set hg executable per-project

column3: Have you submitted a contributor license agreement? If not, please follow the steps described at http://www.jetbrains.com/agreements/cla/ to sign it.
@klikh - Just a gentle reminder that this is still out here.  If there's anything else I should do (perhaps pull-request to the 173 branch instead of 172?), just let me know.

@mkillianey Thanks for your contribution. My colleague answered in the related issue that we're going to implement this a bit differently to overcome the usability issue. We plan to make the fix soon, both for Git and Hg.
Allow projects to override the hg executable on a per-project basis.
